column2: "You managed to observe the dragon soul mist..? It's as fantastic as I expected."
"This rainbow mist can't be any normal kind of weather. But this data is strange, it's different from that of abnormal weather too."
"Yes, it's as if there's some kind of life force inside the mist..."
"...Wait, what am I saying..? I've got to analyze this phenomenon right away."
"Anyhow, you've completed my request! Thank you so very much!"
